title.rendered: INSTANT BTC CARDING METHOD, CASH OUT NOW! – Damecoins

content.rendered:
BTC CARDING METHOD

Damecoins.com offers buying of bitcoins instantly without ID or KYC with your credit card. This is a good website for carders. The payment gateway will however force you to 3d verification for the issuing bank. So as always make sure to choose nonvbv cards form wcc

Choose a card with good amount so we can try to card $500 worth of bitcoin.

Some of the bins in wcc got balance checker so make use of it

Requirements:

  • PC – We will install the app on pc
  • wcc-plug account – Buy NonVbv CC from wcc-plug.su for this method.
  • Fullz – To avoid verification, use Fullz with all personal info

For easy carding, always use a card with all fullz info as it saves you time to get background info and speed up verification process.

Site: https://damecoins.com

Table of Contents

  • BTC CARDING METHOD STEPS:
  • 1. Register and Buy Fullz from WCC-PLUG.CC
  • 2. Select crypto and amount
  • 3. Payment Gateway
  • 4. Fill Card billing
  • 5. Gateway 3d Verification

BTC CARDING METHOD STEPS:

1. Register and Buy Fullz from WCC-PLUG.CC

Go to wcc-plug.cc and create a new account, fill your email and create password.
Use this direct link site: https://wcc-plug.cc
Once you have your account created. Go to deposit and follow deposit guide and load up btc to your account
Choose a USA Nonvbv Card for this method. Make sure all fields are checked like the image below.

A good way to choose the cards in the wcc-plug site is to always select the cards with all info checked. From the image above. If we are to choose a USA card. We will choose the one in the green highlight as it has all the info. This will help fill our security questions easily.
Address and personal info are needed.
US card with proxies matching the city and state for this method will play a big role

2. Select crypto and amount

The 2 drop downs from the site homepage will allow you to select the crypto you want and the amount you want to pay. There are preset values which you can just click to select the amount.

You can choose to click on one and proceed

If you choose to go with a custom value. You can type your value and proceed to personal info fields.
Here you will fill your Fullz names, phone and address

Take not of the cards supported buy the site. Visa MasterCard and Discover. When choosing the cards on WCC make sure you choose among the 3.

Click on Buy Btc button below to proceed

3. Payment Gateway

Next you will be redirected to the payment gateway. You will fill the 4 fields for the cc info. Cc number validity and cvv. The form is simple

Fill your cc Fullz info one by one without pasting anything.

Next click on the Pay button

4. Fill Card billing

Continue to card billing info and enter the address of the Fullz. Confirm the address on Google buy just typing and making sure its valid before proceeding. The address acts as the security question and thus you need to make sure the address is valid before continuing

5. Gateway 3d Verification

Now the reason we choose Nonvbv cards is because the gateway will try to enforce 3d security and try to get 2fa. If your card is secured, an SMS code will be sent to the owner phone number, but if your card is a nonsecure one (NONVBV) you will easily get rid of the security

Click on proceed to go to issuer page

On clicking proceed I will be redirected to new tab for the issue bank page and it looks like this for my card. Since its nonvbv there will be no field to request code so the prompt will be just to accept transaction.
Take not the site added $17 for charging the transaction. If you want to use a certain limit, give some allowance to the site so it does not charge more and go over your limit

Click on accept and you will be taken back to the purchase window and you will get a confirmation like these

The page will refresh and taken back to Damecoins.com. Finalize the account creation with password and some info. The btc will be credited to our account. You can choose to trade or send the bitcoin to the wallet you want, btc carding method complete
